@coderGirlnl @Netlify @jekyllrb @eleven_ty @GoHugoIO @ReactStaticJS @gatsbyjs @nuxt_js Showing rollbacks is really easy to do and can be a powerful demo. Especially if it spans a good chunk of time or a dramatic change. I often roll back https://t.co/gnZ4JUxRXp 2 or 3 years demos. (and then revert back to latest!). Confidence in this ability is big.
